last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jayden takes revenge on Jingi. One year later, Yihan faces a retrial.

name: Doctor Lawyer
overview: The heartwarming story of a genius surgeon who becomes a lawyer specializing in medical crimes after losing a patient to a surgical malpractice. Cathartic and suspenseful, this medical and legal drama paints the courtroom like an operating room, where a life may end or be given a fresh start.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Genius surgeon Yihan performs a heart transplant for Seokju, before he gets a secretive call.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Seokju dies from the surgery and Yihan goes on trial as the accused.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Five years later, Yihan returns as a lawyer and takes the case of Kitae, his former colleague.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Kitae dies suddenly. Yihan suspects it is related to Banseok University Medical Center.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Soyeon, an idol trainee, visits New-Hope Law Office, claiming she is a victim of ghost surgery.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Yosub shows up as a witness to Soyeon's case.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yihan confirms he can operate on Junghyun's son. Meanwhile, Yihan meets Jingi after five years.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Junghyun asks Yihan to begin operation on her son, as his condition worsens.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Yihan succeeds in the operation on Junhwan thanks to Yosub. Hyukchul breaks his promise.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Yihan meets Jinwoo, boyfriend of Sunae, Miseon's daughter. Jayden competes in an auction house.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Yihan reveals Sunae has been taken hostage by Jingi. Jayden tells the truth about the new drug.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Yihan transplants Jinwoo’s lung to Sunae. Jayden offers a deal to Dohyung in a gambling house.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Yihan saves Yoonseok from Gukkwang Gang. A film of Jingi killing Dohyung is shown in the hearing.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Jingi and Miseon are arrested. Yihan tries to reveal the VIP that stole the heart of Seokju.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Yihan is sure Jayden took Seokju's heart. Someone unexpectedly shows up at Jingi’s trial.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Jayden takes revenge on Jingi. One year later, Yihan faces a retrial.
